title: The Hunter (D)
brief_description: Set in the farming district of the Coolah Valley, New South Wales, this short fictional film is an indictment of the senseless and indiscriminate shooting of kangaroos, purportedly for sport or recreational value, which sometimes takes place out in the Australian bush. With John Shellabear. WARNING: CONTAINS SOME DISTURBING SCENES.
